column1: [@okcthunder on Instagram] Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, Theo Maledon, Isaiah Roby, and Justin Jackson all received vaccines from OU health today.

OKC's starting lineup last night was Ty Jerome, Poku, Moses Brown, Justin Jackson, and SGA. Other players who got significant time were Theo Maledon, Kenrich Williams, Isaiah Roby, and Darius Miller. Did you know all of these players existed before this post?

If the Westbrook trade cannot be finalized until 6th August, why is Isaiah Jackson (22nd pick from Lakers) already being introduced as a Pacer?

[Charania] Sources: Wizards selecting Isaiah Jackson at No. 22.

[5-Team Trade] The Wizards acquire Kuzma, KCP, Harrell, Dinwiddie, Aaron Holiday and Isaiah Todd (#31). The Lakers acquire Russell Westbrook. The Nets acquire two seconds (2024, 2025) and an $11.5M exception. The Pacers acquire Isaiah Jackson (#22). The Spurs acquire Hutchison and a second (2022).

[Turner] Lakers announced they have acquired guard Russell Westbrook and three future second round picks from the Washington Wizards in exchange for Kentavious Caldwell-Pope, Montrezl Harrell, Kyle Kuzma and the draft rights to Isaiah Jackson
Isaiah Jackson ties NBA Summer League single-game block record. My way too early ROY prediction!

[Boardroom] Inspired by Kevin Durant’s experiences, Swagger explores the world of youth basketball — and stars O’Shea Jackson Jr., Isaiah Hill and Quvenzhané Wallis. The series will premiere on Oct 29th on Apple TV+.
